document.full_text: toyota motor corp  president akio toyoda said on friday that the devastating earthquake and tsunami in northeast japan would hurt the company's earnings, but said that was not on his list of priorities.
document.title: toyota: earnings hit but priority is japan recovery
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  president akio toyoda said on friday that the devastating earthquake and tsunami in northeast japan would hurt the company's earnings, but said that was not on his list of priorities.
